title: Duck Riot and their AFK system
body: FIX YOUR *Duck*. My internet cuts out and DC me from a game, I join back a minute later and finish the game. I play another match where the power goes out in a storm for literally one second in my area. I have to wait 8 mins for the internet to reboot and I finish the game from there, we even won. I get a notice that I am placed in low prio because of "Leaving that game". Riot needs to create a better system for this.

replies.body:
The leaverbuster system will place players in a lower priority queue after multiple leaves, and not just a single game.  You can be placed in an LPQ regardless of intent because all leaves causes others a negative experience.  Even if you returned to the match, there's still a period of time where the match was down a player.  More information on this can also be found in our [Leaverbuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)FAQ.  

I know some things like storms are out of your control, but if you are having any other issues I'd be glad to help.  

Otherwise, I hope that gets some ducks in a row.
